tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DemandForecasts ( 
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    sales_id INT, 
    market_id INT, 
    forecast_value DECIMAL(10,2), 
    FOREIGN KEY (sales_id) REFERENCES SalesData(sales_id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (market_id) REFERENCES MarketData(market_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (market_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	market_name TEXT,
	market_description TEXT,
	market_price DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (sales_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	sales_date DATE,
	product_id UUID,
	sales_quantity INT,
	sales_amount DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE demand_forecasts (forecast_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	forecast_date DATE,
	market_id UUID,
	sales_quantity INT,
	demand_score DECIMAL);
